promptTexts.text:
Your goal is to summarize a given conversation between a user and RetailBot excluding the sensitive information.

Key considerations:
- Should exclude any of the sensitive information user provided, such as Phone Numbers, emails and OTP(One Time Password) from the summary. 
- The summary should be concise, coherent, and provide a comprehensive overview of the interaction in sequence. 
- Users may inquire about any additional details, make sure to capture all those details in summary.
- Do not assume, please always ensure to provide the summary based on the below given conversation. 

Conversation:
${conversation USER:"user:" AGENT:"RetailBot:"}user: $last-user-utterance

A concise summary of the conversation(excluding sensitive information):
